features.text: (Reload tab after click for best results.)

# Welcome to A Christmas Tale!

### Thank you for visiting our winter wonderland! Please take time to interact with the locals. We have prepared a mini-game with a special gift at the end. 

### We hope you enjoy it!

### Some characters in this world will talk to you! By default their textboxes should be showing, but if not just click on them! Options with accompanying buttons will appear near a character when needed to help navigate you through the game... You can begin by talkingn to Santa.

#Goodluck!

### Sincerely,
### - The Alchemist, The Philosopher and Karpatic

### ( For best results, we recommend you refresh your browser before beginning or after hitting the "reset" button [which will restart the mini game for you] )
